segments.text: Good morning , sir ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! I'd like to buy twelve tickets to Beijing for October 14th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . We have many trains going to Beijing , fast train , through train , express train and tourist train . Which train do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the express one , with air-conditioning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you'll have two choices . Train No . 14 leaves at 6:00 p . m , and train No . 22 leaves at 8: 00 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do they arrive in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They will arrive the next morning , at 8: 00 a . m . and 10:00 a m . respectively .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case I think Train No . 14 will be better . We can do more sightseeing in Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Trains No . 13 and No . 14 are the best trains on the line between Beijing and Shanghai . Which seats do you prefer , cushioned seats , ordinary seats , cushioned berth , or ordinary berth ?
segments.speaker: S1
